retention_statement: Retain 25 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on cover sheet.

series_description: Documents application to the Mandatory Continuing Legal Education (MCLE) board for approval of Continuing Legal Education courses for credit in Virginia. Includes (in paper format) original application with required attachments and correspondence regarding approval. Information maintained in Virginia State Bar Database.
retention_statement: Retain 2 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on cover sheet.

series_title: Form 1 - End of Year Reports - MCLE
series_description: Documents changes to official Mandatory Continuing Legal Education
retention_statement: Retain 3 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on cover sheet.

series_description: Documents Mandatory Continuing Legal Education (MCLE) courses officially completed by attorneys from July 1, 1986 - June 30, 1989 hat are maintained in paper. Records created after that period are maintained in Virginia State Bar Database.
retention_statement: Retain 15 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on cover sheet.

retention_statement: Retain 30 years on-site, then transfer to the State Records Center for 20 years; then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on cover sheet. Total retention period 50 years.
